bill.title: Sales tax; provide diversion to Jackson to defray ad valorem tax loss and increased costs incurred as seat of state government.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-75, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For The Payment Of An Additional Percentage Of Sales Tax Revenue Generated From Business Activities Within The City Of Jackson, Mississippi, To The City Of Jackson; To Provide That Such Payment To The City Of Jackson Is For The Purpose Of Assisting The City To Defray The Ad Valorem Tax Loss The City Sustains As A Result Of The State Ownership Of Property In The City, And For Defraying Increased Infrastructure Costs Incurred By The City As A Result Of Being The Seat Of State Government; And For Related Purposes.
